title: 1.51.0: 404 when running `python3 ./x.py build`
body: When attempting to build 1.51.0, the build system gives me a 404 error: ``` user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ python3 ./x.py build Updating only changed submodules Submodules updated in 0.08 seconds downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 spurious failure, trying again downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 spurious failure, trying again downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 spurious failure, trying again downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 spurious failure, trying again downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 failed to run: curl -# -y 30 -Y 10 --connect-timeout 30 --retry 3 -Sf -o /tmp/tmpstjjc4sm https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:00:01 user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ ``` It is trying to download https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz which does not appear to be valid: ```xml NoSuchKey The specified key does not exist. rustc-builds/50b9553c1504b1af991b662f6cbd6a3a51b925d7/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz K8KYS12B9TYZ9B83 CJc3+8xIDqQyagKxQPh7YDMsv0FwbN7SNPgSWHcXxxkH8EtbSoEuc0ktgTRP833wr4FyiPzY3jc= ``` This is an unmodified checkout, and I am working from the `1.51.0` tag: ``` user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ git status HEAD detached at 1.51.0 nothing to commit, working tree clean user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ ``` ``` user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ git rev-parse HEAD 2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0 user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ ``` ``` user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ cat config.toml # Includes one of the default files in src/bootstrap/defaults profile = "library" changelog-seen = 2 user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ ``` ``` user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ rustc --version rustc 1.51.0 (2fd73fabe 2021-03-23) user@Cuboid:~/Code/Xous/rust$ ```
